title: Bronze II Player Looking For Duo Partner
body: Ive made it to silver the last 2 years. Just havent had enough time to grind this year. Looking for a partner that is untiltable and can play every role. Will pay in honors each game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I would duo sometimes, i main ADC but can jungle and mid pretty well also.

I usually play later at night during the week and early morning on weekends EST - IGN - BeyondLiesRuin
